title: Monica Lewinsky says Trump impeachment investigation has been 'hard'
text: Peter: But XR co-founder Clare Farrell defended the Tube action and said: "The public, I don't think, realise quite how serious this situation is." - That's because I've lived 53 years, was told an ice age was coming due to CO2, then later was told dire warming was coming and that by 2020 New York would be under 2 feet of water and the earth would be in turmoil. Once you live through so many cultish claims of the end of the world, you tend to not see. There is a good reason for that. It's called lack of trust in cult leaders who only want to use scare tactics to control their members.
description: Monica Lewinsky is behind a powerful new antibullying campaign called “The Epidemic” — and, while promoting it, revealed that she has become "little more on edge" as the impeachment inquiry into President Trump dominates the news.
